duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide office support services within a campus unit to include organizing and preparing correspondence, reports and other documentation; scheduling meetings and events; file maintenance, and related administrative activities; and assisting customers with their service needs.
Specific duties will be determined based on assignment and unit needs.
This position will interact on a consistent basis with: unit management and staff, vendors and office visitors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Office Management, or related field (Associate's degree preferred)
